attributes.action: Clear guidance on the legal age children can be left alone or babysitting.
attributes.additional_details:
There is no clear age limit, In law, for children being left at home alone. I am calling for;

 - A clear age limit of when a child can be left at home alone.

- A clear age limit at what age a child/ young person can look after another child at home.

After knowing someone who was cautioned for 'Abandoning' an 11 year old child at home for 2 hours.
